item.title: smart notes
item.description: index < PKM “writing is where thinking takes place” #on/thinking #on/writing emergent knowledge notes capture insight, highlights don’t insights should be relevant, not verbatim. save what speaks steps handwrite (in your moleskine) note symbols this allows you to actively engage with the text. upload references: quotes ideas: insights, or atoms file ?? how can i stumble across this again?
